imdb.plot outline: In the late 1970s, Zhao, Ye and Peng lived in a small courtyard of a small town in the south. Zhao Fangyuan and his wife Tang Miaoxiang nurtured five children, the family live a poor but warm life. Zhao Fangyuan entrusted by his father, to help save a leaf old painting. In an accident, in order to save his family benevolent wife, the old painting fell into the hands of Peng Shizhong, Zhao Shizhong to continue to blackmail to blackmail, and even his daughter Peng Xinhua also joined, in order to break up the love of Zhao Jiahui and Ouyang. Ye Wenxiang, the eldest son of a leaf, has always been in fear of having a problem of origin. He refuses to recognize the fact that the antiques are related to himself. After the reform and opening up, he learned that the true value of the antiquity was too high. In order to keep his father's promise, Zhao Fangyuan and Peng started a long contest. Around the ancient paintings, the three sons and daughters also started their own entangled love and hate. After several decades, Zhao Fangyuan Witnessed the original owner.
imdb.title: Wo xin canlan
